google.com.ratingDisc: This website is rated safe. However, since this is a search engine, the results may not all fit this rating.
google.com.providedDescription: Search the world's information, including webpages, images, videos and more. Google has many special features to help you find exactly what you're looking for.
google.com.funFact: Google was launched in 1998, so if you look up 'Google in 1998', you get an old version of Google!
google.com.summary: Google is a search engine that allows you to extensivley search the web. Google is safe on it's own, but since it searches the entire internet and displays it, some results may vary in safness.

bing.com.ratingDisc: This website is rated safe. However, since this is a search engine, the results may not all fit this rating.
bing.com.providedDescription: Bing helps you turn information into action, making it faster and easier to go from searching to doing.
bing.com.funFact: Over 70% of those who use Bing are older than 35.
bing.com.summary: Microsoft Bing is one of the major search engines. It has an extensive databse, and it also allows you to earn rewards through searching.

chess.com.ratingDisc: This website is safe, but it has a chat feature, which can be disabled, and groups.
chess.com.providedDescription: Play chess online for free on Chess.com with over 100 million members from around the world. Have fun playing with friends or challenging the computer!
chess.com.funFact: Using Chess.com, you can play an array of celebreties in bot form!
chess.com.summary: Chess.com is a website in which you can play friends, strangers, or bots. Work on improving your skills and see your rating.

mozilla.org.providedDescription: Mozilla puts people before profit, creating products, technologies and programs that make the internet healthier for everyone.
mozilla.org.funFact: Firefox, Mozilla's broswer, was originally called Phoenix, but it was renamed to 'Firefox' because that's a red panda's nickname. A red panda was the orignial icon.
mozilla.org.summary: Mozilla is a nonprofit that works to keeping the internet safer. Their website includes many tools that can help you privatly and safely browse the internet.

chat.openai.com.ratingDisc: This website is rated safe. However, there is a small chance ChatGPT may generate harmful or offensive content.
chat.openai.com.providedDescription: ChatGPT is an AI-powered language model developed by OpenAI, capable of generating human-like text based on context and past conversations.
chat.openai.com.funFact: ChatGPT's training dataset contains over 570 GB of text.
chat.openai.com.summary: ChatGPT is a website where you can ask an AI any question, and it will respond mostly with a helpful answer. It's always improving.

gustycube.xyz.providedDescription: If you are bored, click through this website. There is games, and coding projects.
gustycube.xyz.summary: This is a website where GustyCube posts their projects.

facebook.com.ratingDisc: This website is a social media platform, so you should watch for unsafe posts, and strangers.
facebook.com.providedDescription: Connect with friends, family and other people you know. Share photos and videos, send messages and get updates.
facebook.com.funFact: The owner of Facebook, Meta, also owns Instagram.
facebook.com.summary: Facebook is a social media service allowing posting, selling using Facebook marketplace, and advertising. You should be wary of what is on it.

twitter.com.ratingDisc: This website is a social media platform, so you should watch for unsafe posts, and strangers.
twitter.com.providedDescription: From breaking news and entertainment to sports and politics, get the full story with all the live commentary.
twitter.com.funFact: There are more than 229 million daily active users on Twitter.
twitter.com.summary: Twitter is a social media platform where you can discuss news, and sports. It is a social media platform, so you should be careful about using it.

instagram.com.ratingDisc: This website is a social media platform, so you should watch for unsafe posts, and strangers.
instagram.com.providedDescription: Instagram - A simple, fun & creative way to capture, edit & share photos, videos & messages with friends & family.
instagram.com.funFact: Meta, the owner of Instagram, also owns the Oculus.
instagram.com.summary: Instagram is a social media platform where you can talk to friends, and post what you are doing. Be careful, it's a social media platform.

youtube.com.ratingDisc: This website is a social media platform, so you should watch for unsafe posts, and strangers.
youtube.com.providedDescription: Enjoy the videos and music you love, upload original content, and share it all with friends, family, and the world on YouTube.
youtube.com.funFact: Youtube's founders created Youtube using their salary from working at PayPal.
youtube.com.summary: Youtube is a site where you can watch videos from your favorite creators. Watch out for unsafe videos and posts!

linkedin.com.ratingDisc: This website is a social media platform, so you should watch for unsafe posts, and strangers.
linkedin.com.providedDescription: 500 million+ members | Manage your professional identity. Build and engage with your professional network. Access knowledge, insights and opportunities.
linkedin.com.funFact: More than 70% of LinkedIn users are based outside the US.
linkedin.com.summary: LinkedIn is a social media plkatform where you can share your work experience.

pinterest.com.ratingDisc: This website is a social media platform, so you should watch for unsafe posts, and strangers.
pinterest.com.providedDescription: The best part of Pinterest is discovering new things and ideas from people around the world.
pinterest.com.funFact: On Average, 1 pin gets 11 repins and generates 6 website visits
pinterest.com.summary: Pintrest is a social media platform where you can discover new foods, things, and ideas from your friends, family, and people around the world.

wordpress.org.ratingDisc: This website is a website/blog builder, so it is safe to visit.
wordpress.org.providedDescription: Log in to your WordPress.org account to contribute to WordPress, get help in the support forum, or rate and review themes and plugins. Username or Email Address.
wordpress.org.summary: WordPress is a website where you can create your own blog or website.

wordpress.com.ratingDisc: This website is a website/blog builder, so it is safe to visit.
wordpress.com.providedDescription: Create a free website or build a blog with ease on WordPress.com. Dozens of free, customizable, mobile-ready designs and themes. Free hosting and support.
wordpress.com.summary: WordPress is a website where you can create your own blog or website.

wikipedia.org.ratingDisc: This website is safe, but watch out for false facts, as this site is edited by anyone.
wikipedia.org.providedDescription: Wikipedia is a free online encyclopedia, created and edited by volunteers around the world and hosted by the Wikimedia Foundation.
wikipedia.org.summary: Wikipedia is a free online encyclopedia that is create and edited by volunteers from around the world.

redapplesmedia.com.providedDescription: Red Apples Media is a full-service video production marketing company in Central Florida. We specialize in production, advertising, branding.
redapplesmedia.com.funFact: This company will help you if you want to advertise your products!
redapplesmedia.com.summary: Red apple media is a company that helps you market your products.

microsoft.com.providedDescription: Explore Microsoft products and services for your home or business. Shop Surface, Microsoft 365, Xbox, Windows, Azure, and more. Find downloads and get support.

microsoft.com.summary: Microsoft is a company that creates products like Surface Laptops and Powerpoint. Visit this site to buy them.
